refnamediv.refpurpose: Accept a connection on a socket created by stream_socket_server

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Accept a connection on a socket previously created by stream_socket_server. If timeout is specified, the default socket accept timeout will be overridden with the time specified in seconds. The name (address) of the client which connected will be passed back in peername if included and available from the selected transport.
refsect1.simpara: peername can also be determined later using stream_socket_get_name.
If the call fails, it will return &false;.

warning.para: Using this function with UDP server sockets is an error. You should use stream_socket_recvfrom and stream_socket_sendto instead.

refsect1.para: See also stream_socket_server, stream_socket_get_name, stream_set_blocking, stream_set_timeout, fgets, fgetss, fwrite, fclose, feof, and the Curl extension.
